tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE artworks (
    id INT NOT NULL,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    artist VARCHAR(255),
    year INT,
    description TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);
CREATE TABLE collectors (
    id INT NOT NULL,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE ArtPieces (
    piece_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    piece_name VARCHAR(255),
    artist_name VARCHAR(255),
    year_created INT,
    medium VARCHAR(255),
    collector_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (collector_id) REFERENCES ArtCollectors(collector_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PurchaseHistory (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    purchase_date DATE,
    purchase_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    piece_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (piece_id) REFERENCES ArtPieces(piece_id)
);

CREATE TABLE collectors (collector_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    collector_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    collection_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    collection_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE artworks (artwork_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artwork_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    artist_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    year_created INT,
    medium VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10,2));

CREATE TABLE categories (category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    category_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE collection_tags (tag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tag_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    artwork_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (artwork_id) REFERENCES artworks(artwork_id));

CREATE TABLE artworks (
    artwork_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(100),
    artist VARCHAR(100),
    year_created INT,
    medium VARCHAR(50),
    style VARCHAR(50),
    collector_id INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_collector FOREIGN KEY (collector_id) REFERENCES collectors (collector_id)
);

CREATE TABLE artwork_categories (
    artwork_id INT,
    category_id INT,
    CONSTRAINT pk_art_cat PRIMARY KEY (artwork_id, category_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_artwork FOREIGN KEY (artwork_id) REFERENCES artworks (artwork_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_category FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES categories (category_id)
);

CREATE TABLE appraisals (
    appraisal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artwork_id INT,
    appraised_value DECIMAL,
    appraiser VARCHAR(50),
    date_appraised DATE,
    CONSTRAINT fk_artwork_id FOREIGN KEY (artwork_id) REFERENCES artworks (artwork_id)
);
